subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: For Murray, the medical problems of his father-in-law, Nigel Sears, and the impending birth of his first child have added to the weight of playing in the Australian Open.
snippet: For Murray, the medical problems of his father-in-law, Nigel Sears, and the impending birth of his first child have added to the weight of playing in the Australian Open.
